data.title: Will Chase - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Will Chase: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Actor and singer most famous for his role as Luke Wheeler on the ABC series Nashville. He is also a Broadway actor who has won acclaim for his work in productions like Kiss of the Spider Woman and The Mystery of Edwin Drood.

Before Fame

He was a Percussion major at the Oberlin Conservatory of Music.

Trivia

He was nominated for a Tony Award for Best Featured Actor in a Musical for playing John Jasper and Mr. Clive Paget in The Mystery of Edwin Drood.

Family Life

He was married to Lori Chase from 1998 to 2008 and they had two children together. He was then married to Stephanie Gibson from 2009 to 2012. After his divorce from Gibson, he dated Debra Messing for over two years before beginning a relationship with Ingrid Michaelson in 2015.

Associated With
